name: Bloody Ice
description: Welcome to the bloody snowy island. Throughout the level, you will walk through snow and blood. Music is "Death Rattle" from Tactics Ogre. This level was updated on 3-19-2019. Changes since the last release include fixing some unaligned textures, adding Doom 3 and death sounds from Hard Doom, and removing unused textures. Demo can be found at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RpfXqJzERus
